creator.description:
Automated label service allowing you to hide Twitter and other screenshots. Created and maintained by @aendra.com and the XBlock volunteers.

Mislabelled posts: please report (specifying XBlock) using the Bluesky "report post" button!

üåê xblock.aendra.com

policies.description: Labels screenshots from Twitter (and elsewhere) because life is too short to be that angry

locales.description: An image detected as a screenshot taken from Discord, contents may or may not be offensive
locales.name: Possible Discord screenshot

locales.description: An image detected as a screenshot taken from NGL, contents may or may not be offensive
locales.name: Possible NGL screenshot

locales.description: Miscellaneous screenshots detected by a computer vision model. After human intervention, this label is dropped and a more specific one is added.
locales.name: Uncategorised screenshot

locales.description: An image detected as a screenshot taken from Twitter, contents may or may not be offensive
locales.name: Possible Twitter screenshot

locales.description: An image detected as a screenshot taken on an alt-right platform (Truth Social, Gab, 4chan, et cetera), contents quite likely offensive
